item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: I’m finally making the leap, and (hopefully) moving this website to blogdown + hugo + gitlab + netlify. So far, useful resources for wrapping my head around how to do this: Alison Presmanes Hill’s documentation Very useful gotcha for configuring Netlify Non-blogdown specific very detailed outlined (for future reference, when I want to add new page types) Things that don’t seem to work: Math! ðŸ˜­ (but, hey, emoji do!
